contentrichtext.text: {{Unreferenced|date=December 2009}} {{Politics of Åland}} The '''Landskapsregering''' is the [[government]] of [[Åland]], an autonomous territory of [[Finland]]. The government is led by a ''Lantråd'', the [[premier]] of Åland, who is elected by the ''[[Parliament of Åland|Lagting]]'', the parliament of Åland. ==List of Premiers of Åland (1922-Present)== *Mr [[Carl Björkman (politician)|Carl Björkman]] (1922 - 1938) *Mr [[Viktor Strandfält]] (1938 - 1955) *Mr [[Hugo Johansson]] (1955 - 1967) *Mr [[Martin Isaksson]] (1967 - 1972) *Mr [[Alarik Häggblom]] (1972 - 1979) *Mr [[Folke Woivalin]] (1979 - 1988) *Mr [[Sune Eriksson]] (1988 - 1991) *Mr [[Ragnar Erlandsson]] (1991 - 1995) *Mr [[Roger Jansson]] (1995 - 1999) *Mr [[Roger Nordlund]] (1999 - 2007) *Mrs [[Viveka Eriksson]] (2007 - 2011) *Mrs [[Camilla Gunell]] (2011 - present) ==The Government 2011- == Government member parties: Åland Social Democrats (S), Åland Centre Party (C), The Independent Group (Obs) and The Moderates of Åland (M): :'''Premier''' (lantråd): :*Mrs. [[Camilla Gunell]] (S) :'''Deputy premier''' (vice lantråd), '''Minister of Finance''': :*Mr. [[Roger Nordlund]] (C) '''Minister of Education and Culture''': :*Mr. [[Johan Ehn]] (M) :'''Minister of Social Affairs and Environment''': :*Mrs. [[Carina Aaltonen]] (S) :'''Minister of Administration and EU-affairs''': :*Mrs. [[Gun-Mari Lindholm]] (Obs) :'''Minister of Industry and Trade''': :*Mr. [[Fredrik Karlström]] (Obs) :'''Minister of Communications and Infrastructure''': :*Mrs. [[Veronica Thörnroos]] (C) ==The Government 2007-2011== Government member parties: Åland liberals (lib) and Åland centre (c): :'''Premier''' (lantråd): :*Mrs. [[Viveka Eriksson]] (lib) :'''Deputy premier''' (vice lantråd), '''Minister of Education and Culture''': :*Mrs. [[Britt Lundberg]] (c) :'''Minister for Finance''': :*Mr. [[Mats Perämaa]] (lib) :'''Minister of Social Affairs and Environment''': :*Mrs. [[Katrin Sjögren]] (lib) :'''Minister of Administration and EU-affairs''': :*Mr. [[Roger Eriksson]] (lib) :'''Minister of Industry and Trade''': :*Mr. [[Jan-Erik Mattsson]] (c) :'''Minister of Communications''': :*Mr. [[Runar Karlsson]] (c) 2007-2009 :*Mrs. [[Veronica Thörnroos]] (c) 2009- ==See also== *[[Government of Åland 2003-2007]] *[[Government of Åland 1999-2003]] *[[Parliament of Åland]] *[[Eduskunta|Parliament of Finland]] *[[Åland State Provincial Office]] *[[Provinces of Finland]] *[[Thing (assembly)|Ting]] {{Government of Europe}} {{DEFAULTSORT:Government Of Aland}}
